body_html: My workaround for now is to just reshape my tensor to [-1, 1, 1, depth] (with depth as the number of outgoing connections of my fully connected layer). This seems to work, but it would be nice to have this built in.
body_text: My workaround for now is to just reshape my tensor to [-1, 1, 1, depth] (with depth as the number of outgoing connections of my fully connected layer). This seems to work, but it would be nice to have this built in.
body: My workaround for now is to just reshape my tensor to `[-1, 1, 1, depth]` (with depth as the number of outgoing connections of my fully connected layer). This seems to work, but it would be nice to have this built in.
